title: Anthroposophic Health Association
cleaned_text: can still be found here at anthroposophichealth.org We are the doctors and therapists of Anthroposophic Medicine in North America. PROFESSIONAL membership Available to the members of the seven professional associations that make up the Anthroposophic Health Association. Explore our eight member associations and what they offer. PUBLIC FIND AN ANTHROPOSOPHIC THERAPIST or DOCTOR Search our member directory to find anthroposophic medical therapies near you. Membership Benefits Include: international newsletters on anthroposophic health and medicine Upcoming events
